title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to Baseball Hall of Famer Mariano Rivera. Chris Mannix calls in to discuss the likelihood of a deal between the Celtics and Nets for Kevin Durant.  Plus, former NFL Defensive back Jason McCourty shares his thoughts on Kyler's contract clause stating that  he has to watch 4 hours of film weekly. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to Baseball Hall of Famer Mariano Rivera. Chris Mannix calls in to discuss the likelihood of a deal between the Celtics and Nets for Kevin Durant.  Plus, former NFL Defensive back Jason McCourty shares his thoughts on Kyler's contract clause stating that  he has to watch 4 hours of film weekly.
